# Output Directory
This directory contains generated documentation files.

## Files

- `api-docs.json` - Complete API documentation
- `current-docs.json` - Current documentation snapshot (for validation)
- `scan-results.json` - Route scan results
- `openapi.json` - OpenAPI 3.0 specification
- `openapi.yaml` - OpenAPI 3.0 specification (YAML format)
- `validation-report.txt` - Validation report from shell scripts

## Auto-generated

All files in this directory are auto-generated and should not be edited manually.
